channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Intel reaches deal to make chips for US military
item.description: The secretive program, called Secure Enclave, seeks to establish production for advanced chips with military and intelligence applications.

item.title: Brazil supreme court unfreezes assets of Elon Musk's Starlink, X after taking fines
item.description: Brazil's supreme court announced that it ordered funds be moved from Starlink and X bank accounts to pay for fines levied against Elon Musk's social n...

item.title: What traders are saying about new — and now suspended — election-betting rules
Ex-Jefferies fund manager faces criminal investigation over alleged Ponzi-like scam
item.description: The government probe marks an escalation in scrutiny of Chirico’s management of 352.

item.title: MicroStrategy stock pops 8% after company ups bitcoin holdings to $14.6 billion
item.description: MicroStrategy founder Michael Saylor said on Friday that his company purchased an additional $1.1 billion worth of bitcoin.

item.title: China just raised its retirement age. American workers should take notice.
Investors’ bets on the outlook for oil prices has never been this bearish
item.description: Hedge funds turned net bearish on Brent crude for the first time on record as concerns about an oversupply of oil hammer futures prices.

item.title: Shein and Temu prices are set to get a lot higher as Biden takes aim at retailers linked to China
item.description: Critics say Shein and Temu are able to offer low prices because they evade import duties under the de minimis exemption — a loophole that could soon b...

item.title: Here’s why the biggest retailers are crushing smaller chains in a tough economy
Wamco loses Russell Bond Fund as fallout over star trader probe escalates
item.description: Wamco, which has been losing clients for years, was hit by a fresh wave of investor redemptions due to a probe of its co-chief investment officer.

item.title: DJT shares soar as Trump says 'I'm not selling' stake
item.description: Donald Trump, the majority owner of Trump Media stock, is eligible to sell his DJT shares later this month.

item.title: Gold is an ‘all-weather hedge against whatever happens’ as Fed's decision nears
Boeing strike could cost $3.5 billion if it drags on as workers feel ‘a lot of bad blood’
item.description: "They went 10 years without getting much of a raise at all — they are trying to make up for lost time."

item.title: A big Fed meeting looms in the week ahead as economic concerns percolate
item.description: The central bank is widely anticipated to make its first interest rate cut after embarking on its hiking campaign in March 2022.

item.title: Nasdaq posts 6% weekly gain as U.S. stocks climb ahead of Fed's rate decision
